1: “I’m bored, daddy. Will you play with me today?”
“Yay! We should go to the park next time”
2: “Daddy, will you read to me today?”

“I always wanted to know about the Milky Way! 
Let’s sit over there!”
3:
“Daddy, I really want some ravioli today.
 Will you make some with me?”

“Ravioli! Ravioli, ravioli, viola ra! 
I want to mix the sauce, daddy!”
4:
“Boo! Did I get you, daddy? 
Hee hee! I’m over here!”
5:
“I think you should go to work today.
 I’m a big girl! I can take care of me!”

“Daddy, you always work so hard.
 ...I love you, daddy.”
6:
“Daddy… My head doesn’t feel so good. 
Will you take care of me?”
19:
Dad… I… I don’t know if I’m going to make it past today. 
 Please don’t go to work.  Stay with me.  Please.
